Entrepreneurial Healthcare Information Technology Executive
February 3, 2015, Libby worked with Andrea in different groups

Andrea and I worked together to take our divisions products and solutions to the healthcare market, i.e., hospitals and health systems, health insurers and government health. She was the account manager for large organizations like Kaiser, Sutter, Stanford and various west coast 'Blue's'.  Andrea was focused on identifying her customers’ healthcare challenges and articulating a solution which would match the organizations vision and budget.  She has the ability to quickly build client relationships and earning her right as a  trusted advisor.  She took an under penetrated territory for our division and through her knowledge of the healthcare industry and her dedication built a successful pipeline and brought deals to a close.

Leonard Yee
Executive Assistant to SVP Bus Dev, Chief Compliance Officer & General Counsel and VP Commercial Dev  at Cytokinetics
March 29, 2017, Andrea was senior to Leonard but didn’t manage directly

I worked with Leonard Yee when he served as Executive Assistant the VP of our Global Marketing team at Niku. Leonard had a great attitude and developed a network quickly within our organization which helped in gathering support from many areas to help us achieve our team’s initiatives. Leonard’s hard work and dedication played a major factor in keeping our department of 50+ people moving efficiently. His organizational skills were exemplary and his ability to keep our busy meeting calendars on track along with his special skills in handling heavy travel requirements made him a strong asset to our team and to our VP. Leonard maintained a great balance of hard work, professionalism, and a great sense of humor. Leonard left after four rounds of layoffs when the department could only keep three employees. But shortly thereafter, Leonard was contacted directly by our CEO to return to Niku to become his executive assistant. Niku was acquired by Computer Associates shortly thereafter. I highly recommend Leonard for any high level administrative position!

summary: Andrea Leggett is currently a Strategic Account Manager at Primary Data Inc.  Her skills and experience range from managing customer engagements, business plan development, messaging development, product launches, to the diligent process of securing broad support for key initiatives from her co-workers and executives.  Her experience in sales, consulting, product marketing/strategy, product management and marketing communications span more than 15 years across various industries – healthcare, insurance, energy, public sector, life sciences and manufacturing. Software Markets:  BPM, CRM, Content Management, Project Management, Knowledge Management, Business Intelligence, Contracts Management, SaaS/Cloud Applications, and Big Data AnalyticsPlatform/Hardware Markets: Data Lakes, NAS, SAN, SDS, Data Mobility
